title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Skills: Teacher Design of Digital Educational Environments – Online and Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic digital tools and foundational knowledge of curriculum design
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Understand the principles of digital learning environment design and explain strategies for applying smart technologies.
Construct teacher-learner interaction scenarios using simulation/VR tools.
Design formative assessment tools and integrate them into online learning processes.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
